course_description: This second course of a two-semester ST sequence offers an introduction into the second part of the course of Christian doctrines, including soteriology, ecclesiology, and eschatology. Prerequisite ST 501.
prerequisites: ST 501 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
schedule_location: TTh 8:30am-9:50am in Rita Anne Rollins Building_501
sections: Class Nbr: 5362, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 8:30-9:50a, Instructor: S. Loesel, Status: Open
